short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The only extension you need to deal with old bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clixood is a Google Chrome extension that helps users manage their bookmarks by providing an interactive way to identify and remove obsolete bookmarks. 

It works by randomly selecting a bookmark each time the extension is opened and presenting the user with three options: read, skip, or delete. The user can then choose to read the bookmark, skip it for later, or delete it if it is no longer needed. This helps keep the user's bookmark collection organised and up-to-date.
